alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 3:44PM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Ritzville, Coulee City, Plummer, Potlatch, Lewiston, Rosalia, Genesee, Othello, Coeur d`Alene, Moscow, Gifford, Creston, Grand Coulee, Worley, Davenport, Fairfield, Kamiah, Cheney, Airway Heights, Winchester, Spokane Valley, Lewiston Grade, Moses Lake, Oakesdale, Peck, Pullman, Lapwai, Hayden, Rockford, Odessa, Craigmont, Ephrata, Colfax, Quincy, Downtown Spokane, Culdesac, Post Falls, Tekoa, Uniontown, Nezperce, La Crosse, Wilbur, Soldiers Meadow Road, and Harrington. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Travel will become difficult for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and isolated power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
